camera - Variable in class sage.camera.controllers.AbstractCameraController
 
cartesianToSpherical(Point3D) - Static method in class sage.util.MathUtils
Converts a point from Cartesian coordinates (assuming a right-handed coordinate system with positive Y being up) to Spherical coordinates and returns the result in a Point3D whose components are X=Azimuth, Y=Altitude, and Z=Radius.

Controller - Class in sage.scene
The base class for Controllers, which are objects that can be attached to, and affect, SceneNodes.
Controller() - Constructor for class sage.scene.Controller
Constructs a SceneNode Controller with a default speed of 1, a default cycle time of 1, a default repeat type of Controller.CONTROLLER_REPEAT_TYPE_CLAMPED, and an empty list of controlled SceneNodes.
CONTROLLER_REPEAT_TYPE_CLAMPED - Static variable in class sage.scene.Controller
Specifies a controller behavior that stops when it reaches the end of its cycle.
CONTROLLER_REPEAT_TYPE_CYCLIC - Static variable in class sage.scene.Controller
Specifies a controller behavior that reverses direction (begins going the "opposite way" when it reaches the end of its cycle.
CONTROLLER_REPEAT_TYPE_WRAP - Static variable in class sage.scene.Controller
Specifies a controller behavior that wraps (jumps back to its beginning state) when it reaches the end of its cycle.

Cube - Class in sage.scene.shape
Cube defines a Leaf representing a cube made up of a list of vertices, a list of faces (each of which is a list of four indices into the vertex list), and a list of face colors corresponding in order to the faces in the face list.

Constructs a cube with the specified name, centered at the origin and with vertices at +/- 1 in each of the X, Y, and Z directions.

Constructs a cube with a default name and with other attributes as defined by constructor Cube.Cube(String).

Cylinder - Class in sage.scene.shape
Cylinder defines a Leaf which is a cylinder of a specified height and radius.
Cylinder() - Constructor for class sage.scene.shape.Cylinder
Constructs a Cylinder with a default name and default height of 1.0, default radius of 1.0, default number of slices of 8, and default number of stacks of 4.
Cylinder(String) - Constructor for class sage.scene.shape.Cylinder
Constructs a Cylinder with the specified name; remaining attributes are as specified by the constructor Cylinder.Cylinder().
Cylinder(boolean) - Constructor for class sage.scene.shape.Cylinder
Constructs a Cylinder with the specified rendering attribute (solid or wireframe), and all other attributes as specified by the constructor Cylinder.Cylinder().
Cylinder(double, double, int, int) - Constructor for class sage.scene.shape.Cylinder
Constructs a Cylinder with a default name and with other attributes as defined by constructor Cylinder.Cylinder(String, double, double, int, int).
Cylinder(String, double, double, int, int) - Constructor for class sage.scene.shape.Cylinder
Constructs a Cylinder with the specified name and of the specified height and radius, with the specified values for slices (the number of polygons comprising the cylinder when viewed from above) and for stacks (the number of polygons comprising the cylinder when viewed from the side).
